author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Cuba Mania: guaranteed vacations with a deposit of just $50!Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Cuba Mania: guaranteed vacations with a deposit of just $50! Published on : Thursday, September 3, 2015
As part of its Cuba Mania promotion, Transat is offering travellers the chance to secure their vacation to Cuba, one of the Caribbean’s most popular and sought-after destinations, and take advantage of free seat selection with a deposit of just $50 per person. The offer is valid for bookings made between September 1 and 30, 2015 for travel between December 18, 2015 and April 30, 2016.
In Cuba Transat offers seven destinations, namely Cayo Coco, Cayo Largo, Cayo Santa Maria, Holguin, Havana, Santa Lucia (Camaguey) and Varadero where it offers a wide variety of packages, cruises and tours.
Transat’s Cuba Mania promotion is also combinable with its early booking promotions allowing travellers to take advantage of travel date changes permitted up to 3 hours before departure and a $50 travel credit per person to be used towards their next vacation.
